dict.acceptation: 一起活动；合作；互相影响；互动；

sent.orig: The focus should be transferred from bilateral activity to multilateral interaction-student interaction-interaction, teacher-teacherinteractionman-machine interaction.
sent.trans: 多向互动包括师生互动，生生互动，师师互动，人机互动。

sent.orig: Interaction between tutor and student. Interaction among students. Interaction online and offline.
sent.trans: 老师与学生互动，学生与学生互动，线上线下互动。

sent.orig: Chinese-teaching demands interaction, one is subject interaction, the other is the interaction between subject and object.
sent.trans: 语文教学要求互动，一方面是主体的互动，一方面是主体与客体的互动。

sent.orig: Interaction is a new-fashioned network defense strategy, interaction model is footstone of intrusion protection system.
sent.trans: 联动是一种新型的网络防护策略，联动模型是入侵防御体系的基石。

sent.orig: As a phenomenon a negative interpersonal interaction, social anxiety influences the quality of interpersonal interaction.
sent.trans: 社交焦虑作为人际交往不良的一个现象，影响着人际交往的质量。
